law.catch_line: Unless specifically made applicable, the provisions of this title, except for those in Subtitle 9 of...
law.text: Unless specifically made applicable, the provisions of this title, except for those in Subtitle 9 of this title, do not apply to persons, motor vehicles, and equipment while engaged in construction or maintenance work on a highway. However, the provisions of this title do apply to these persons, vehicles, and equipment when traveling to or from this work.
